::Zardus/Havoc/Demolition::

Zardus growls, looking at the splash as CyberShark runs off. His 
wrist comp beeps, the Iron Fist easily locating his cloaced 
signature. The electricity dispensers powering up, the water around 
Cybershark is filled with heavy shocks, energon nets moving around 
him as well.

Zardus turns to Zergling as Demolition walks over to pick him up, 
Havoc launching off to follow Cybershark, locked on to his signature. 
As soon as the bot left the sea, if the elecrticity and energon 
didn't kill him....
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus frowns, walking up to Zergling. Cybershark had reprogrammed 
the bot, that was obvious. He hears the bot's words before Zergling 
went into stasis.

"No, not betray. Just fix," Zardus says to him, then looking at 
Demolition.

"Take him to the lab, my other self will know what to do."

Demolition nods, walking off toward the Iron Fist.





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::CyberShark/Zergling::
> 
>     CyberShark was hit by some blasts and turned to look at who was 
shooting.
>     "Great," CyberShark said as he lifted Zergling in front of 
him. "Just great."
>     He threw Zergling who was still a little groggy. CyberShark 
then turned toward the sea, running at full steam. He cloaked, he 
didn't care anymore, guns were shooting at him, but after he cloaked 
the guns couldn't find him. He jumped into the sea and started to 
swim deeped, transforming to Beast Mode as he did.
>     He turned on his propellor (A tail that splits into four 
blades) and took off under the water, toward somewhere that he might 
be safe.
